faqDescription: Our auctions are curated through a review process to offer you exclusive articles and protect the platform from irrelevant articles or dropshipping.

faqitem.question: How do I sign up for AuctionShack?
faqitem.answer: You can easily sign up using Google Sign-In or Apple Sign-In within the iOS App.

faqitem.question: What currency is used to transact between buyer and seller?
faqitem.answer: The buyer can pay the seller in CHF via TWINT or in any cryptocurrency, if the seller offers this optional payment method.

faqitem.question: Are there any fees?
faqitem.answer: Using AuctionShack is free for sellers. Buyers pay platform fees on successful auctions.

faqitem.question: How do I pay platform fees?
faqitem.answer: Platform fees can be paid with Shack tokens, which are purchased through in-app purchases.

faqitem.question: What items can I sell?
faqitem.answer: In the app, you will find a list of all permitted items.

faqitem.question: What devices are supported?
faqitem.answer: AuctionShack is currently available only for iOS devices running iOS 17.0 or later.

faqitem.question: What can I do if I have issues with the app?
faqitem.answer: Contact our support team at support@auctionshack.io

faqitem.question: How are auctions curated?
faqitem.answer: Contact our support team at support@auctionshack.io
